metadata.title: CVE-2020-7956 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise up to 0.10.2 incorrectly validated role/region associated with TLS certificates used for mTLS RPC, and were susceptible to privilege escalation. Fixed in 0.10.3.

criterions.comment: nomad package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
